PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-12542011-10-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx-Gratia Payment program - Air India Flight 182
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Human Resources and Skills Development to assist the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness in delivering the AIR INDIA FLIGHT 182 EX GRATIA PAYMENT PROGRAM, including performing functions related to receiving and assessing applications, making a recommendation with respect to an application and effecting payment on receipt of a positive decision.
AttachmentsAttachment
